meanings.definition: The quality or state of being large in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The bignesses of the mountain amazed the hikers.
meanings.sent2: The bignesses of the ocean are breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The bignesses of the elephant made the zoo visitors gasp.
meanings.sent4: The bignesses of the universe are beyond human comprehension.
meanings.sent5: The bignesses of the canyon left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being important or significant.
meanings.sent1: The bignesses of the decision weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent2: The bignesses of the event shaped the course of history.
meanings.sent3: The bignesses of the cake at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The bignesses of the discovery changed the scientific community.
meanings.sent5: The bignesses of the opportunity could not be ignored.
